Premium Countertop Installation in Monmouth County

Your countertops are the centerpiece of your kitchen and bathroom. At Custom Kitchens & Baths by Lopez, we specialize in professional countertop installation that combines beauty, durability, and functionality.

With over 20 years of experience installing countertops throughout Monmouth County, we've mastered the art of perfect installation. From classic granite to modern quartz, we work with all premium materials to create surfaces that enhance your home's value and your daily life.

Our certified installers ensure precise measurements, flawless cuts, and seamless installation that will last for decades. Whether you're updating your kitchen, renovating a bathroom, or building new, we deliver exceptional results every time.

Choose Your Perfect Countertop Material

We offer a wide selection of premium countertop materials to match your style, budget, and lifestyle. Each material has unique benefits and characteristics.

Granite Countertops

Natural beauty with unmatched durability. Each slab is unique with stunning patterns.

Key Features:

  • Heat resistant
  • Scratch resistant
  • Unique patterns
  • 15-25 year lifespan
Price Range: $40-$100 per sq ft

Quartz Countertops

Engineered perfection combining beauty and performance. Non-porous and low maintenance.

Key Features:

  • Non-porous surface
  • Consistent patterns
  • Stain resistant
  • No sealing required
Price Range: $50-$120 per sq ft

Marble Countertops

Timeless elegance for luxury kitchens. Perfect for baking and classic aesthetics.

Key Features:

  • Cool surface
  • Elegant veining
  • Timeless appeal
  • Increases home value
Price Range: $60-$150 per sq ft

Solid Surface

Seamless installation with invisible joints. Great for modern, minimalist designs.

Key Features:

  • Seamless joints
  • Repairable surface
  • Custom shapes
  • Integrated sinks
Price Range: $35-$85 per sq ft

Not sure which material is right for you? Visit our showroom to see and feel samples.

Schedule Showroom Visit

Our Professional Installation Process

From initial consultation to final inspection, we manage every detail of your countertop installation to ensure perfect results.

1

Free Consultation

Visit our showroom or schedule an in-home consultation to explore materials and discuss your vision.

2

Precise Measurement

Our experts take detailed measurements and create templates to ensure perfect fit.

3

Material Selection

Choose from hundreds of slabs in our supplier network. We help you find the perfect match.

4

Fabrication

Your countertops are precision-cut, polished, and prepared with your chosen edge profile.

5

Professional Installation

Our certified installers ensure perfect placement, secure mounting, and flawless finishing.

6

Final Inspection

We thoroughly inspect every detail and provide care instructions for your new countertops.

Why Choose Us for Your Countertop Installation?

Certified Installers

Our installation team is factory-trained and certified by major manufacturers. We follow best practices to ensure your warranty remains valid.

Laser Precision

We use laser templating technology for perfect measurements and cuts. This ensures seamless fits around sinks, cooktops, and edges.

Lifetime Support

Our relationship doesn't end at installation. We provide ongoing support, maintenance tips, and are always available for questions or concerns.

Competitive Pricing

Direct relationships with suppliers mean better prices for you. We offer transparent pricing with no hidden fees or surprises.

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does countertop installation take?

Most countertop installations are completed in 1-2 days. The entire process from template to installation typically takes 1-2 weeks, depending on material availability and fabrication requirements.

What is the most durable countertop material?

Quartz and granite are the most durable options. Quartz is non-porous and requires no sealing, while granite offers superior heat resistance. Both materials can last 25+ years with proper care.

How much do new countertops cost in Monmouth County?

Countertop costs vary by material and project size. Basic installations start around $2,000, while premium materials for large kitchens can reach $8,000+. We provide free quotes for accurate pricing.

Can you install countertops without replacing cabinets?

Yes! We frequently install new countertops on existing cabinets. We'll inspect your cabinets to ensure they're structurally sound and make any necessary reinforcements before installation.

Do you remove old countertops?

Absolutely. Our service includes removal and disposal of your old countertops. We handle everything from disconnecting sinks and cooktops to ensuring proper disposal of materials.

Have more questions about countertop installation?

Contact Our Experts
